message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at $120. I believe it's a great deal and will be valuable for you.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money. Would you be willing to consider a lower price?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product's value is quite high. How about we meet in the middle at $105?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $95?
